thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 18 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hypoport: EUROPACE Financial Marketplace Increases Transaction Volume To More Than Eur 48 Bln For 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hypoport: EUROPACE Financial Marketplace Increases Transaction Volume To More Than Eur 48 Bln For 2017
text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - HYPOPORT AG:
* DGAP-NEWS: HYPOPORT AG: EUROPACE FINANCIAL MARKETPLACE INCREASES ITS TRANSACTION VOLUME TO MORE THAN EUR48 BILLION FOR 2017 AS A WHOLE
* ‍TRANSACTION VOLUME PER SALES DAY AT A RECORD EUR198 MILLION IN Q4 2017​
* FY VOLUME OF TRANSACTIONS* GENERATED ON EUROPACE B2B FINANCIAL MARKETPLACE UP 7.9 PERCENT TO EUR48.2 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
